availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis "Frank" P. Clay (Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan R. Wornall Clay in Clay County, Kentucky, on October 27, 1842. Father of William H. Clay, Henrietta Clay, F. P. Clay, Nancy Clay, and Olive Clay. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1850. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1860. Owned sixteen enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
